scripts.postinstall: echo 'Please make sure you are using Node.js '$(cat .nvmrc)' (run "nvm use" if you have nvm installed)'
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:snapshot && npm run test:e2e
scripts.fix-node-version: echo 'To switch to Node.js '$(cat .nvmrc)', please run: source ./scripts/switch-node.sh'
scripts.lint: nx run-many -t lint --projects=web,api,web-e2e,api-e2e && npm run lint:md && npm run lint:sh && npm run lint:yaml
scripts.format: nx format:write && npm run format:md && npm run format:sh && npm run format:yaml
scripts.coverage: npm run test:unit -- --coverage --coverageReporters=lcov && npm run test:snapshot -- --coverage --coverageReporters=lcov && find coverage/apps -name "lcov.info" -exec cat {} \; > coverage/lcov.info
scripts.coverage:report: npm run test:unit -- --coverage --coverageReporters=text-summary,html,lcov && npm run test:snapshot -- --coverage --coverageReporters=text-summary,html,lcov && find coverage/apps -name "lcov.info" -exec cat {} \; > coverage/lcov.info
scripts.coverage:open:
npm run coverage:report && echo '
Coverage reports generated at:' && echo 'Web: file://${PWD}/coverage/apps/web/lcov-report/index.html' && echo 'API: file://${PWD}/coverage/apps/api/lcov-report/index.html' && open coverage/apps/web/lcov-report/index.html coverage/apps/api/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.coverage:fresh: rm -rf coverage && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf .nx/cache && nx reset && nx run-many -t test --projects=web,api --skip-nx-cache --coverage --coverageReporters=text-summary,html,lcov && nx test web --testPathPattern=snapshot --skip-nx-cache --coverage --coverageReporters=text-summary,html,lcov && find coverage/apps -name "lcov.info" -exec cat {} \; > coverage/lcov.info
scripts.coverage:all: rm -rf coverage && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf .nx/cache && nx reset && nx run-many -t test --projects=web,api --skip-nx-cache --coverage --coverageReporters=text-summary,html,lcov && find coverage/apps -name "lcov.info" -exec cat {} \; > coverage/lcov.info
scripts.coverage:all:open:
npm run coverage:all && echo '
Coverage reports generated at:' && echo 'Web: file://${PWD}/coverage/apps/web/lcov-report/index.html' && echo 'API: file://${PWD}/coverage/apps/api/lcov-report/index.html' && open coverage/apps/web/lcov-report/index.html coverage/apps/api/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.coverage:fresh:open:
npm run coverage:fresh && echo '
Coverage reports generated at:' && echo 'Web: file://${PWD}/coverage/apps/web/lcov-report/index.html' && echo 'API: file://${PWD}/coverage/apps/api/lcov-report/index.html' && open coverage/apps/web/lcov-report/index.html coverage/apps/api/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.test:component:fresh:
rm -rf coverage && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf .nx/cache && nx reset && nx test web --testPathPattern=$(echo $npm_config_component || echo 'ClickableButton') --skip-nx-cache --coverage && echo '
Coverage report generated at: file://${PWD}/coverage/apps/web/index.html'
scripts.test:component:fresh:open:
rm -rf coverage && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf .nx/cache && nx reset && nx test web --testPathPattern=$(echo $npm_config_component || echo 'ClickableButton') --skip-nx-cache --coverage && echo '
Coverage report generated at:' && echo 'Web: file://${PWD}/coverage/apps/web/index.html' && open coverage/apps/web/index.html
scripts.preinstall: command -v npx >/dev/null && npx --no-install npm-force-resolutions || echo 'Skipping npm-force-resolutions'
scripts.update:deps: npm audit fix && npm install && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m 'Claude: Update dependencies and sync package-lock.json'

scripts.sonar:update-tasks:

'; let sonarContent = ''; if (sonarTasks.includes('## High Priority Tasks')) { sonarContent += '### High Priority Issues

' + sonarTasks.split('## High Priority Tasks')[1].split('## Medium Priority Tasks')[0].replace('- No high priority issues found', '').trim() + '

'; } if (sonarTasks.includes('## Medium Priority Tasks')) { sonarContent += '### Medium Priority Issues

' + sonarTasks.split('## Medium Priority Tasks')[1].split('## Security Tasks')[0].replace('- No medium priority issues found', '').trim() + '

'; } if (sonarTasks.includes('## Security Tasks')) { sonarContent += '### Security Hotspots

' + sonarTasks.split('## Security Tasks')[1].split('## Technical Debt Tasks')[0].replace('- No security hotspots found', '').trim() + '

'; } if (sonarTasks.includes('## Technical Debt Tasks')) { sonarContent += '### Technical Debt

' + sonarTasks.split('## Technical Debt Tasks')[1].split('## Coverage Improvement Tasks')[0].replace('- No code smells found', '').trim() + '

'; } if (sonarTasks.includes('## Coverage Improvement Tasks')) { sonarContent += '### Coverage Improvements

' + sonarTasks.split('## Coverage Improvement Tasks')[1].split('Tasks generated')[0].trim(); } const sectionExists = tasksContent.includes('## SonarCloud Tasks'); let updatedContent; if (sectionExists) { updatedContent = tasksContent.replace(/## SonarCloud Tasks[\s\S]*?(
## |$)/, sonarSection + sonarContent + '

$1'); } else { updatedContent = tasksContent.replace('# Project Tasks', '# Project Tasks

' + sonarSection + sonarContent + '
'); } fs.writeFileSync('TASKS.md', updatedContent); console.log('SonarCloud tasks have been integrated into TASKS.md');"
